items.content_html: Lightweight, web-based polling application that allows team members to cast votes simultaneously
items.title: BaoFelix/MiniPoller: Lightweight, web-based polling application that allows team members to cast votes simultaneously

items.content_html: A lightweight example of a basic microservice architecture. This project demonstrates essential concepts like REST API creation, service-to-service communication, and data handling. Perfect for beginners looking to understand microservices or developers seeking a quick reference for building scalable backend solutions.
items.title: sidharth096/microservice-demo: A lightweight example of a basic microservice architecture. This project demonstrates essential concepts like REST API creation, service-to-service communication, and data handling. Perfect for beginners looking to understand microservices or developers seeking a quick reference for building scalable backend solutions.

items.content_html: Insomnie is a lightweight CLI and TUI HTTP client for developers. Inspired by Postman, Insomnia, Bruno and Cartero, but with a minimalist text-based interface. Test and debug APIs quickly with an intuitive and customizable tool.
items.title: marco-gallegos/insomnie: Insomnie is a lightweight CLI and TUI HTTP client for developers. Inspired by Postman, Insomnia, Bruno and Cartero, but with a minimalist text-based interface. Test and debug APIs quickly with an intuitive and customizable tool.

items.content_html: A very lightweight and flexible accessible modal dialog script.
items.title: KittyGiraudel/a11y-dialog: A very lightweight and flexible accessible modal dialog script.

items.content_html: X-UI is a lightweight, user-friendly web panel designed for managing Xray configurations. Ideal for personal use, it streamlines the process of managing server configurations, making it accessible for everyone.
items.title: localzet/X-UI:  X-UI is a lightweight, user-friendly web panel designed for managing Xray configurations. Ideal for personal use, it streamlines the process of managing server configurations, making it accessible for everyone.

items.content_html: Pictopia is a simple, lightweight gallery library that allows you to display images in a responsive grid. It features fullscreen viewing with navigation, zooming, and thumbnail previews. You can customize the display and easily integrate it into your website with just a few lines of code.
items.title: sumeetghimire/Pictopia: Pictopia is a simple, lightweight gallery library that allows you to display images  in a responsive grid. It features fullscreen viewing with navigation, zooming, and thumbnail previews. You can customize the display and easily integrate it into your website with just a few lines of code.

items.content_html: PR ewviewer is a simple, lightweight tool for reviewing GitHub Pull Requests. It streamlines the code review process by providing a clean interface to view and comment on diffs, see reviewer feedback, and manage multiple PRs efficiently.
items.title: brainstormforce/pull-request-reviewer: PR ewviewer is a simple, lightweight tool for reviewing GitHub Pull Requests. It streamlines the code review process by providing a clean interface to view and comment on diffs, see reviewer feedback, and manage multiple PRs efficiently.

items.content_html: LLRT (Low Latency Runtime) is an experimental, lightweight JavaScript runtime designed to address the growing demand for fast and efficient Serverless applications.

items.content_html: The Lightweight Chat Application enables users to join chat rooms using a display name, interact with others in real-time, and exchange messages instantly. This project focuses on simplicity and real-time interaction using Socket.IO, which creates live connections between clients and the server.
items.title: Chaithu341/Chat: The Lightweight Chat Application enables users to join chat rooms using a display name, interact with others in real-time, and exchange messages instantly. This project focuses on simplicity and real-time interaction using Socket.IO, which creates live connections between clients and the server.
